product_name: Rock Climbing Guide to the Castle Rock Area
long_description: This guide details some of the best rock climbing in the Castle Rock area. Author: Bruce Morris. Softcover; 215 pages; black-and-white maps; color photographs. MorComm Press; copyright 2007. Section overview, detail and individual climb maps help orient you to the targeted climb; illustrated photographs chart your route up the wall. Guide also provides information on seasons, access, length, difficulty and surrounding points of interest.
short_description: This guide details some of the best rock climbing in the Castle Rock area.
